important.title: Account Takeover - IDOR on Password Change / API Parameters

variants.notes: Tamper with user-identifying parameters (user id/email) while authenticated as an attacker to change another user's password.

steps: Intercept change-password request in Burp Repeater or Proxy.
Modify target identifier (userID/email) parameter to victim and send.
If server lacks proper authorization checks, password changes for victim succeed.
mitigations: Enforce server-side authorization: ensure operations validate ownership and ACLs server-side, not just client-supplied IDs.
Use strong session management and monitor unusual privilege escalation requests.
Implement logging and anomaly detection for account modification attempts.
